question: Which State government’s Skill Development Corporation has partnered with Coursera, to train unemployed youth?
explanation:
Tamil Nadu Skill Development Corporation (TNSDC) has partnered with Coursera, a leading online learning platform, to train 50,000 unemployed youth during the Covid-19 pandemic.
Coursera launched ‘Coursera for Government’ programme under its Workforce Recovery Initiative. In this offering, under which any state or country can provide unemployed workers with free access to online learning.
